name: new-bs-helper-extension

scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run zip
scripts.release:dev: npm run clean && npm run build:dev && npm run zip -- --dev
scripts.version:patch: node scripts/bump-version.js patch && npm run release
scripts.version:minor: node scripts/bump-version.js minor && npm run release
scripts.version:major: node scripts/bump-version.js major && npm run release

description: BigScoots Performance Debugger - A comprehensive tool for analyzing website performance metrics including cache headers, CDN status, preloaded fonts and images, and various optimization features.
